name: November 2022 Release Hotfix 1 (version 1.40.1)
body:
## Version 1.40.1
* Release date: November 22, 2022
* Release status: General Availability
## What's new in 1.40.1
* Bug fixes in 1.40.1
    * Fixed bug that caused folders in the servers tree to display incorrect contents (https://github.com/microsoft/azuredatastudio/issues/21245)


|Platform |Type             |Download |
| --------|-----------------|----------------------- |
|Windows  |User Installer   |[64 bit][win-user] |
|         |System Installer |[64 bit][win-system] |
|         |.zip             |[64 bit][win-zip] |
|Linux    |.tar.gz          |[64 bit][linux-zip] |
|         |.deb             |[64 bit][linux-deb] |
|         |.rpm             |[64 bit][linux-rpm] |
|Mac      |.zip             |[Universal][osx-universal] [Intel Chip][osx-zip] [Apple Silicon][osx-arm64] |
